articles.title: Tackling Covid-19: Bengaluru firm creates affordable ventilators that need no electricity - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Priced at around Rs 2,500, the ventilator is the cheapest of its kind in the world, NITI Aayog CEO Amitabh Kant.
articles.content:
Amid the coronavirus crisis, a Bengaluru-based technology firm has created just what is needed to tackle the challenge - a low cost ventilator that requires no electricity. 
Priced at around Rs 2,500, the ventilator is the cheapest of its kind in the world. … [+2248 chars]
